name: Auras [Chillenium2022 Jam]
description:
1-2 PLAYER 5 MINUTES GAMPAD CONTROLLED

Uses one gamepad. 

Can be played solo, but encouraged for two players to play using the same gamepad.

====================================

Controls

Red Character

- Move : Left Stick

- Lower Shield : Left Trigger

(Playing with 2 - this player takes left side of controller)

Blue Character

- Move : Right Stick

- Lower Shield : Right Trigger

(Playing with 2 - this player takes right side of controller.)

While your shield is down, your aura damages projectiles of your own color, but you are more vulnerable to projectiles of the opposite color.

You can heal each other if both of your shields are down. Beware if not.

Game scales in difficulty as time goes on! See how far you can get.

There is no reset or menu in the jam build, so just restart the program if you die.

====================================

Solo Project.

Made in Gamemakerstudio2.
